jetstream.name: Jetstream
jetstream.desc: The favor of the winds is yours: landing three hits (five for light weapons) without taking damage against your opponent envelops you in a shield of wind.

umami.name: Umami
umami.desc: Feast on foes with mighty cutlery. Chef Weapons now steal opponents hunger.

silencer's song [lht].name: Silencer's Song [LHT]
silencer's song [lht].desc: Silencer's Blade now procs on your mantras.

silencer's song [med].name: Silencer's Song [MED]
silencer's song [med].desc: Silencer's Blade now procs on your mantras.

overwhelming might.name: Overwhelming Might
overwhelming might.desc: Strong Left, Table Flip and Skyshatter Kick now all guardbreak at level 5.

simmerbloom.name: Simmerbloom
simmerbloom.desc: Basic Attacks on Pleeksty's Inferno are now granted flames.

silencer's song [hvy].name: Silencer's Song [HVY]
silencer's song [hvy].desc: Silencer's Blade now procs on your mantras.

grotesque resilience.name: Grotesque Resilience
grotesque resilience.desc:
You take reduced damage from 'Damage over Time' effects. 
[50%, 25% while Flame Within is active.]
[Bleed reduction is 25%.]
